page.title: 13BOWDEN VILLAGE (cont.)
page.content: There are more old than new houses in the village,the proportion being roughly 2 to 1. The village hall is used quite extensively by various groups and clubs e.g. Womens Guild,the SWRI,a Mothers and Toddlers group,Country Dancing and Keep Fit classes. Since there is no employment in the village,workers have to commute to the nearby towns such as Newtown where the Borders Regional Council has its headquarters. Apart from the clubs and groups, there are no other forms of entertainment and those wishing to visit restaurants,hotels,cinemas,theatres or nightclubs must travel to the larger towns.
